title: Reportable?
body:
Um, I don't usually make threads involving the ever-present 'Rito ban X summoner' topic, but I was curious on a situation that I found myself in, and I wanted to know the opinion of the boards:

We had a Pantheon who insisted on going top lane, despite the fact that a Renekton had already claimed that position in a majority of our champion select chats. Ultimately, he didn't stubbornly hold on to his will, and instead traversed to the role as a full-damage support, which was much better than being stuck with a duo toplaner. However, it seemed that the Pantheon had also held held a grudge against the Renekton, and for the course of the game, abused his skills at League of Legends.

This is where the catch comes along- it appeared that the Pantheon was Chinese, as he frequently cursed the Renekton in Chinese, donning him with offensive tags, which he/she assumed that no one else could understand. (I was able to pick one or two up, due to a Chinese friend of mine.)

Although I didn't report the Pantheon, as Atticus Finch states, "You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view... Until you climb inside of his skin and walk around in it." It was obvious that he was having a bad day, and his use of derogatory language was kept at a minimum...ish. However, in cases where someone takes advantage of a different language, and vents their criticism towards a player in that particular language, should I report that summoner? Do you think that it is worthy of a ban/report? What do you guys think?

Cheers,
-Anserem

replies.body:
For cases such as these, definitely utilise the end of game reporting feature. Consistent reports are the only way to ensure that a player gets punished.
The player behaviour detection systems don't just work in english, they work in so many other languages and are constantly adapting to detect things like this. 
>_You can read more about this [HERE](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/reports-how-do-they-work) as well as read up on reportable behaviour [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player) (that one is a lil outdated, but still holds some key points). 
_

 If it was a ranked game and he was assigned a role but forced it on someone else/did what he wanted anyway, this is also reportable and auto detectable (unfortunately not so much for norms).

Good luck, have fun ♥
